column1: Wondered what R0 is for Corona virus? Estimates are 1.4 to 5.5... thats 1.4 to 5.5 people infected by someone that catches it... it’s apparently infectious before symptoms show... once those around the World have been diagnosed clusters can be identified https://www.news.com.au/lifestyle/health/health-problems/coronavirus-outbreak-what-is-an-r0-and-why-is-it-so-important/news-story/27054a834bafc405f69d04d1b4c2742c …

Paramedic son apparently had a suspected corona virus patient today... no messing about, full positive pressure bio-protection suits being worn... Reading current CDC update, transmission can be up to 6 feet via air droplets from coughing etc... #coronavirus #coronavirusuk
